content: --मुख {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (--खी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {1} going into the mouth, pointing or turned inward; <ls>Mv. 5. 26.</ls> {2} having an inward entrance or opening ( बाह्यवस्तुपरिहारेण परमात्मविषयकतया प्रवेशयुक्तं चित्तादि). {3} an epithet of the soul called प्राज्ञ, when it is enjoying the sweet bliss of sleep (आनंदभुक् चेतोमुखः प्राज्ञः इति श्रुतेः). (--खं a sort of surgical scissors (having an opening inside), one of the 20 instruments mentioned by Suśruta in chapter 8 of Sūtrasthāna.
